display_long_description:
🚀 **Your home is under attack! Zooky needs a hero!**

🛡️ **PROTECT THE BABY** 

Your mission is to protect Zooky from endless waves of invading spaceships! Arm yourself with a variety of weapons, whether close-range or long-distance, and stop the abductors before it’s too late. The battle takes place right in your own home, thanks to Mixed-Reality technology!
[media]

🔫 **USE POWERFUL WEAPONS**

Gear up, hero! The invaders won’t stop themselves.
Fire up devastating laser cannons, rain chaos with explosive grenades, and unlock a legendary arsenal of weapons designed to obliterate anything in your path!
[media]


👾 **FACE DIVERSE ENEMIES**

The invaders won’t make it easy! Encounter different types of enemy ships, each with unique attack patterns and strengths. From bombers to snipers, every wave will challenge your reflexes and strategy.
[media]

🧰 **UPGRADE YOUR GEAR**

Earn rewards and upgrade your weapons to take on tougher waves. Unlock new tools and firepower to improve your defenses and keep Zooky safe!
[media]


⚠️ **Early Access Notice**

This game is currently in Early Access and under active development.
We're constantly working to expand, polish and improve the experience.
Your feedback is key to helping us shape what comes next.

⚒️ Check out the **known issues** here:  https://tinyurl.com/roominvaders

Join our Discord crew — news, updates, giveaways, and good vibes await!
👉 https://discord.gg/etermaxrstudio
